titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design Student Records for the Classes of 1982-1996
Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design Student Records for the Classes of 1982-1996
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:13

did.unittitle: Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design student records for the Classes of 1982-1996

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of student records of the Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design in Brissago, Switzerland, an affiliate of the Yale School of Art.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 37 (YRG 37), Records of associations, institutes, centers, and organizations affiliated with Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design Student Records for the Classes of 1982-1996 (RU 239). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of student records of the Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design in Brissago, Switzerland, an affiliate of the Yale School of Art.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by last name.

controlaccess.subject: Art students
College students
controlaccess.corpname: Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design

did.unittitle: Student records for the Classes of 1982-1996 of the Yale Summer Program in Graphic Design
